item.description:
It's Summer! Time to Party! Time to enjoy the beauty of Boston Harbor!

It's the 8th Annual "Rock The Boat" Party Cruise & we're going to join in this year. This event attracts HUNDRED's of fun folks (800 last year!) - it's going to be great!

For full info & to purchase your tickets, go to:
"Rock The Boat" Summer Party Cruise

PLEASE NOTE: Special Offer 2-for-the-price-of-1 tickets UNTIL MAY 15th!!
PLEASE NOTE: You must buy your tickets from Boston Event Guide. BBTC is not selling the tickets for this event.

Calling all Young Professionals! Enjoy 3 floors of entertainment with a large top deck for dancing under the stars.

This year features DJ "Karl" spinning great top 40 dance music, a Sinatra lounge, and complimentary henna tattoos. Then join us for a free after party nearby from 11 - 1 with a live band.

All guests will be welcomed with party favors and entered to win:
2 tickets to The Resolution Ball
A spot on the white water rafting trip
2 tickets to the get your sox on event in August
1 spot as a ride-along for the Nascar driving event

Only $25 in advance or $30 at the gate (if available)

Special 2 for 1 pricing until May 15th - over 800 attended last year!
item.how_to_find_us: We will arrange to meet up nearby the Pier. Details to follow closer to the time.
item.why: Boston Harbor in the summer time - what's not to love?!!
item.name: "Rock The Boat" Summer Party Cruise
